body: Title says all, spawnkillers, fast hit glitch, contact me when this glitch will be fixed, this is like kill aura and really really anoying. Goodbye Nexus :/
body_tagged: Title says all, spawnkillers, fast hit glitch, contact me when this glitch will be fixed, this is like kill aura and really really anoying. Goodbye Nexus :/
title: Taking Nexus break

replies.body: What's the fast hit glitch? I play Nexus and I haven't heard of it... :T
replies.body_tagged: What's the fast hit glitch? I play Nexus and I haven't heard of it... :T

replies.body: That's a random glitch who is doing 5 hits in one hit only...
replies.body_tagged: That's a random glitch who is doing 5 hits in one hit only...

replies.body: Supposedly, Nexus now has very good hit detection which makes it very difficult to play for some people.

replies.body: This glitch makes you hit as fast as the game lets you (4 Hits/sec) and it looks non-legit. Not even the best autoclicker can do that, i don't think.

replies.body:
"Title says all, spawnkillers, fast hit glitch, contact me when this glitch will be fixed, this is like kill aura and really really anoying. Goodbye Nexus :/" -Thecalined 
Well I talked to Evocal and he said, he is working at the spawnprotection and the fast hit glitch is a glitch, you can't do anything against this. But I don't know why you stop playing this amazing gamemode :D
